nodes.text: Ana Zett was a female Human Jedi Knight, serving the Jedi Order during the last years of the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, Zett served as a General within the Grand Army of the Republic, and was sent to the planet of Felucia, where she required the help of a young Jedi Knight.

A female Human, Ana Zett was inducted in the Jedi Order, where she was trained in the ways of the Force. During the Clone Wars, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Zett served as a General within the Grand Army of the Republic.

Some time later, Zett was sent to the planet of Felucia, assigned to oversee the operations of a task force sent to hold back Separatist troops. While on the planet, Zett's lightsaber was damaged, and took refuge on a hill overlooking a nysillin farm where she sent out a distress call. Her lightsaber was repaired when a fellow Jedi brought a replacement piece.
